text: Joan Mesquida Ferrando (6 December 1962 - 19 October 2020) was a Spanish politician. He was a member of the Congress of Deputies for a short time in 2019. He was the Director-General of the Spanish National Police and Civil Guard from 2006 to 2008. Mesquida was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. Mesquida died of cancer in Palma de Mallorca, Spain on 19 October 2020, aged 57.Fallece Joan Mesquida, ex director general de la Guardia Civil y Polic√≠a Nacional ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Spain Category:Spanish politicians
title: Joan Mesquida
